headline: ACTON RESEARCH DUV SPECTROPHOTOMETER
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Acton Research Corpo
Model CAMS 507
Description Spectrophotometer -- DUV
Accessories
  • Windows XP computer
  • Cryo pump
  • He lines
  • He compressor
  • Mechanical pump
Other Information
  • Designed to measure the reflectance, transmittance and absorbance in the 115-300nm wavelength range.
  • 0.75 meter vacuum monochromator
  • Vacuum is 5E-5 Torr or better
  • Computer controlled vacuum system with Cryotorr 8 cryo pump, compressor and mechanical pump
  • 3 channel readout system with 3 photomultipliers
  • Focused deiterium lamp

The Acton Research CAMS-507 DUV provides precise reflectance, absorption and transmission measurements in the 120nm to >350nm wavelength range, with unsurpassed repeatability.
The system is designed to measure samples including CaF2, "dry" fused silica, deep UV optics, thin film coatings, photoresists and silicon wafers under vacuum or nitrogen purged conditions.

Power Requirements 200-240 V 30.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
